dataList.name: Failed Ambush
dataList.desc: Turn End: if this unit lost a Clash this turn, gain 2 [Binding] next turn

dataList.name: Jia Qiu's Test
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start: gain [RepressedMurderousIntendTwo]
Ends Encounter when Hong Lu dies

dataList.name: Effloresced E.G.O::Érlì
dataList.desc: First Turn Start: heal 30 SP and gain [ExaminationOfQiu]

dataList.name: Deteriorate (削貶)
dataList.desc: If target has 4+ negative effects, Clash Power +1

dataList.name: Deathrite [Halt (勿動)]
dataList.desc: Deal +10% damage against targets with [BurstStop]

dataList.name: Deathrite [Impede (掣肘)]
dataList.desc: Take -20% damage from targets with [BurstSuppress]

dataList.name: Heed me, Zilu
dataList.desc:
Gains a new pattern at 85% HP
Enter a new phase at 60% HP

dataList.name: This is where your path ends
dataList.desc: Ends encounter when Hong Lu dies

dataList.name: Overwhelm
dataList.desc: When an Identity's HP drops to 1 or below, retreat them from the Encounter

dataList.name: Estimation
dataList.desc: Turn End: for every Clash this unit lost, gain 1 Binding next turn (max 6)

dataList.name: Shin (心) Radiance
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start: heal 30 SP
Gains a new pattern at 85% HP
Gain 500 Shield at Turn Start, at 60% HP
- After this effect activates, this unit does not drop below 1 HP

dataList.name: Effloresced E.G.O::Érlì
dataList.desc: First Turn Start: gain [ExaminationOfQiu]

dataList.name: Diminish (貶)
dataList.desc: If target has 3+ types of Deathrites, Coin Power +1

dataList.name: I will ask again
dataList.desc: Ends the Encounter at 50% HP

dataList.name: Focus
dataList.desc: When using 'Bring Forth a Real Answer', summon the Heishou

dataList.name: Focus
dataList.desc: Begins the Encounter with half the Potency and Count for the following effects this unit had at the start of this phase: [Burst], [Combustion], [Sinking], [Vibration], [Laceration]

dataList.name: Infinite Song of Erudition
dataList.desc:
After Attack: heal 5 SP for every Deathrite on the target
On Hit, when the target's Deathrite is triggered, heal 3 SP for every Deathrite triggered

dataList.name: I still await your answer.
dataList.desc:
Every Turn Start: Core and Part gain 900 Shield.
- When Hong Lu has [Teaching], lose 300 Shield per Stack on Hong Lu
- When Hong Lu has 3+ [Teaching], this unit does not gain Shield for the rest of the Encounter

dataList.name: Hate
dataList.desc: Final Power +2 in Clashes against Hong Lu

dataList.name: Unleashed Curse
dataList.desc: Turn Start: gain [AttackUp] equal to the number of Jars defeated in this Encounter (max 5)

dataList.name: Returning the Pain
dataList.desc: Deal +1% damage for every 1% missing HP on self (max 50%)

dataList.name: Bolus of... Immortality?
dataList.desc:
On Hit with a Skill: heal 10% of the damage dealt (rounded down)
If target has [MadFeather], heal additional ([MadFeather] Stack on target)% HP

dataList.name: I'VE NEVER FELT BETTER!
dataList.desc: On Hit, heal 3 SP on self

dataList.name: MY REVENGEANCE HAS JUST BEGUN!
dataList.desc: Gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn every time this unit loses a Clash (max 3)

dataList.name: Rupture by Feathers
dataList.desc: Whenever this unit hits the same target three times in the same turn, inflict 1 [Vulnerable] next turn

dataList.name: Rampage
dataList.desc: Offense Level +1 and Defense Level -1 for every 15% HP this unit cumulatively lost in this Encounter (max 6)

dataList.name: Wounded
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: enters the battle with 80% HP

dataList.name: Master of the Deathrite Monks
dataList.desc:
Turn End: at 20 or less SP, this unit siphons 10 SP from 3 random allies with the highest SP to heal its own SP

Turn Start: Apply 2 [AttackDmgUp] to all other allies with -20 or less SP

dataList.name: Wicked Energy
dataList.desc: When inflicting [OminousTalisman] on an enemy, if the target already has [OminousTalisman], consume up to 3 [OminousTalisman] on the target and inflict the same value as [DefenseDown] Stacks to the target this turn and next turn

dataList.name: Dammit... Take them out!
dataList.desc:
In this Encounter, if this unit takes damage that brings this unit's HP down to half or less, nullify that damage and end the turn. Then, move to the rearmost position of the Substitution order (when Staggered, recover immediately)

If there are no more enemies to Substitute in, or if there aren't enough of them left, (as in, if there are more dead enemies this turn than there are waiting to Substitute into the Encounter) this effect does not activate

dataList.name: The Battle's End
dataList.desc: When Wang Qingshan loses all HP in this Encounter, the Encounter ends

dataList.name: Ugh... these damn engravings...!
dataList.desc: Turn End: at 7+ [Charge], gain 4 [DefenseDown] and 3 [AttackDmgUp] next turn

dataList.name: Your shabby weapons are incomparable to mine
dataList.desc: If this unit inflicted 4 or more [Burst] during this turn, gain +3 [Charge] Count at Turn End (once per turn)

dataList.name: Is that all you've got?
dataList.desc: Turn Start: gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] for every [Charge] on self

dataList.name: The Battle's End
dataList.desc: When Shi Hua... something? loses all HP in this Encounter, the Encounter ends

dataList.name: Deploy Lightning Shield
dataList.desc: Turn Start: if this unit has [Charge], gain (100 - (([Charge] - 1) x 10)) Shield. At 7+ [Charge], this unit no longer gains Shield with this Passive.

dataList.name: That's how you use your human resources
dataList.desc: Turn Start: if this unit has 50% or less HP, sacrifice a random Shi Family Mercenary to heal (10% of this unit's HP + 50% of the sacrificed unit's HP) HP, heal 25 SP, and recover from Stagger (once per turn)

dataList.name: Jin Gang, Unbreakable Diamond
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: gain 5 [Protection]
- Gain fewer Stacks depending on this unit's [Charge]
- At 5+ [Charge], this unit no longer gains [Protection] with this Passive

dataList.name: The Battle's End
dataList.desc: When Shi Sijing loses all HP in this Encounter, the Encounter ends

dataList.name: The Battle's End
dataList.desc: When Xue Pan loses all HP in this Encounter, the Encounter ends

dataList.name: The Battle's End
dataList.desc: When Shi Yihua loses all HP in this Encounter, the Encounter ends

dataList.name: My Lord
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: heal 30 SP
Turn Start: gain up to 500 Shield
